bio: Yolanda Davis, Hon. D., is a motivational keynote speaker, published author, coach, and U.S. Air Force veteran. She is the visionary behind The PIVOT Decision™ and I Made the Pivot framework. Recognized as a recipient of the President's Lifetime Achievement Award and an Honorary Doctorate of Humanitarianism.
service_provided: Motivational keynote speaking, transformational coaching, workshops, seminars, consulting
signature_programs: The PIVOT Decision™ Framework, I Made the Pivot, No Satan Not This Time (book), The PIVOT Decision featured in The Change Vol 22, The F in Your Finances
